chemical_systems.name: Li-P-S
chemical_systems.description: Sulfide system, e.g., Li3PS4, known for high Li-ion conductivity

chemical_systems.name: Li-Si-S
chemical_systems.description: Silicon sulfide system, e.g., Li4SiS4, good electrochemical stability

chemical_systems.name: Li-Ge-S
chemical_systems.description: Germanium sulfide system, e.g., Li4GeS4, potential for high ionic conductivity

chemical_systems.name: Li-B-S
chemical_systems.description: Boron sulfide system, e.g., Li3BS3, novel candidate system

chemical_systems.name: Li-P-O
chemical_systems.description: Phosphate system, e.g., Li3PO4, good electrochemical stability

chemical_systems.name: Li-La-Zr-O
chemical_systems.description: Garnet-type oxide conductor, e.g., LLZO, known for excellent performance

chemical_systems.name: Li-S-Cl
chemical_systems.description: Sulfide-chloride system, novel mixed-anion superconductor candidate

chemical_systems.name: Li-S-I
chemical_systems.description: Sulfide-iodide system, novel mixed-anion superconductor candidate
